title: [BUG] Skiasharp native mismatch on MacCatalyst
body:
### Description

> System.InvalidOperationException: The version of the native libSkiaSharp library (88.1) is incompatible with this version of SkiaSharp. Supported versions of the native libSkiaSharp library are in the range [115.0, 116.0).

### Code

Any project using `v3.0.0-preview.3.1` and targeting `net8.0-maccatalyst`

### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Actual Behavior

_No response_

### Version of SkiaSharp

3.x (Alpha)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.2 (Previous)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio Code (macOS)

### Platform / Operating System

Mac Catalyst

### Platform / Operating System Version

_No response_
